title: Meta Projects Increasing Expenses; Takes One-Time Tax Charge
description: Meta Platforms Inc. said it expects total expenses to significantly increase in 2026, and will continue to invest at historic levels in artificial intelligence.
content:
Meta Platforms Inc. said it expects total expenses to significantly increase in 2026, and will continue to invest at historic levels in artificial intelligence.
The company also reported third-quarter net income of $2.71 billion, which included a one... [258 chars]

title: ServiceNow raises annual subscription revenue forecast as AI demand surges
description: ServiceNow raised its annual subscription revenue forecast on Wednesday, driven by growing demand for its artificial intelligence powered software solutions.
content:
Sign up here.
ServiceNow expects full-year subscription revenue to be between $12.84 billion and $12.85 billion, compared with its prior projection range of $12.78 billion to 12.80 billion.

title: Microsoft's high capital spending overshadows cloud business surge
description: Microsoft said on Wednesday it spent nearly $35 billion on artificial intelligence in its fiscal first quarter, surpassing market expectations and overshadowing blockbuster growth in its cloud-computing business.
content:
Oct 29 (Reuters) - Microsoft said on Wednesday it spent nearly $35 billion on artificial intelligence in its fiscal first quarter, surpassing market expectations and overshadowing blockbuster growth in its cloud-computing business.
